thread.title: Transaero Airlines Is Named As Best Operator Of PS-90A EnginesTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Transaero Airlines Is Named As Best Operator Of PS-90A EnginesTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Transaero Airlines Is Named As Best Operator Of PS-90A EnginesTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Transaero Airlines Is Named As Best Operator Of PS-90A Engines Published on : Monday, August 31, 2015
Transaero Airlines has been recognized as the best operator of PS-90A engines. The certificate of United Engine Corporation was awarded on the 26th of August at MAKS 2015 international air show.
The best operator of PS-90A engines is being selected on a certain number of criteria, including intensiveness of engine operation, absence engine cut-outs in flight and engine troubles due to the fault of the operator.
The PS-90A engines are manufactured at Perm Engine Company, which is a part of the United Engine Corporation. These engines are currently deployed on Il-96-300, Tu-204-100, Tu-204-300, Tu-204C, Tu-214 aircraft and their modifications.
Transaero Airlines operates Tu-214 and Tu-204-100C aircraft equipped with PS-90A engines.
Source:- Transaero Airlines
